conbody.p: TokenScript engine is a piece of software that provides Token Layer - a set of api and UI to the applictions and wallets that uses tokens.
TokenScript engine achieves this by interpreating TokenScript, verifying signature and provides the functionalities defined in the TokenScript.

ul.li: The one embeded in AlphaWallet iOS
, a JavaScript embedable Engine to be embeded in the web pages that uses TokenScript

conbody.p: Another JavaScript one intended to be used as a MetaMask plug-in will be developed some time in the future, sharing much of the code with Bootstrap Library.
